text: Sayile ɠɛni ti ma: «À ɠɛ Davide ma: ‹Masagi la vulu zɔngɔ ɠaiziɛzu ná-doun anzanui vaa zu. Nii nɔ wɔin ma, naa ɠa é ga, zunu ani laayɔɓɔ ungila (100), Filisiti nuiti saama, naa ɠa é ɠɛɛzu ga ná-wanaɠulai sili nuiti ba.› » Sayile naa woni, nii a kɛ, é Davide undaaʋili Filisiti nuiti zea.
